name: GratitudeScan
0:
”Alexa, open Gratitude Scan”
”Alexa, ask gratitude scan to start”
”Why”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gratitude scan
Developer Terms of Use
des: Use Gratitude Scan to uncover reasons to be grateful and meditate on them for just two minutes each day. Regularly practicing loving-kindness meditation makes people happier and stress out less. Both gratitude and meditation have extraordinary benefits for our psychological health. Gratitude Scan makes it easy to set yourself up for a happy day.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
